name: bam
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
used to suggest the sound of a sudden hit: I braced for impact. We hit the water, bam!
used to show that something happened very suddenly or quickly: I wrote the order and bam, I sent it off.
More examplesFewer examplesHe grabbed them, and I took a billy club, and I went bam! I hit him on the back of the head.It started raining a little bit and then bam! The storm hit. You leave it here and, bam, it's gone. So, bam, bam, we lost 600 jobs.
